transArray.content: The breakfast is delicious and the environment is safe and comfortable

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for recommending the hotel's accommodation environment and breakfast. The hotel provides a rich and varied buffet breakfast free of charge to Huazhu Club Gold Card and channel breakfast-included guests from 7 a.m. to 10 a.m. every day. The dining time is ample to meet your dining needs at different times. Your affirmation is the greatest encouragement to our work. We look forward to seeing you again. I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
